segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is standing by the sink, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention seems entirely focused on the dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water running from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling the basin and actually spilling over the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A steady sheet of water is pouring onto the cabinets and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised she doesn't seem to notice the growing puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains completely neutral, which is quite astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take her to realize what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a disaster waiting to unfold right beneath her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This casual unawareness is truly remarkable to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
